item.title: Paper Publication｜A Review of Metal-to-Plastic Joinery in Automotive Manufacturing
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: This post will introduce the paper I participated in the research project about the joining of plastic and metal parts in the automotive industry.I studied more than 100 related documents, and formed a group led by the first author and corresponding author.

item.title: Patent Publication｜A Device With Thermoelectric Power Generation And Heat Dissipation Functions And A Thermoelectric Power Generation Method
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: During my freshman year, I participated in the National Undergraduate Energy Conservation and Emission Reduction Social Practice and Science and Technology Competition Project, and was responsible for the 3D model design, rendering and sample production. Won the third prize at the national level and applied for an invention patent
